name: Ground Zero (Joker_101)
description:
[This game was made for the 3rd Annual Hawktober Game Jam]

--------------------------------------------------------------

Halley, a promising member of Blazar Squad (an organization whose goal to ensure the protection of its civillians) has found herself in the midst of a terrible crisis! Unknown swarms of creatures have started a planet wide invasion! You must help Halley navigate her way to the capital where one of many evacuation sites are being held. Shoot your way through waves of monsters and  use the various power-ups scattered along the way to increase your chances of survival!

At the end of the session, there will be a tally that is displayed. If you like, you can share your nickname and tally (with a screenshot/video) and see who can score the most! Got a better score than before? Just let me know with a new screenshot/video and I'll update your score! Scores will be updated until after the jam rankings are finalized.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated playtime: 15 - 20min.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Scenario / Art / Music / Maps / Eventing: Joker101
